column3: Oh no! Your dog ran into the maze! What will you do?
You have entered the maze of secrets
You have reached a crossroads do you go left or right
Right you venture further into the maze and hear the roaring of a beast the mintoaure has appeared!
You hitthe minotuare and deal .. Damage
You have defeated the minotaur although exhausted you must push forwared left or right?
What is this? You see a pond within the maze and in the center of this pondis a mermaide! What will you do?
